Title: As PG seats lie vacant, Mangalore University re-invites applications
Content: With about 750 postgraduate seats in various streams remaining vacant in its institutes, Mangalore University has re-invited applications for 2016-17. The last date for submission of applications is A
Author: Special Correspondent
